title: Rum Bottle Label Font...
content:
Hey does anyone know what type of font this is? I have looked at a couple but can't get to close without it looking outdate. I kind of need to get into the 19th Century time period with it... The 'Cockspur' is the one i'm looking for....

Thanks a lot guys, appreciate it.
author: kilo

comments.content:
That appears to be a Latin, in which the serifs are pretty much triangles. Try [Modesto](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065646/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/parkinson/modesto), and if you want something spikier, maybe [Saracen](http://web.archive.org/web/20120116065646/http:/typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100022) will fit the bill.

EDIT: And also, slightly off-topic, but thanks for being so descriptive of what you're looking for in your thread's title and first post.
